title: Okara man apprehended for beating up children
text:
OKARA: Police on Saturday apprehended a man for beating up three children after tying them upside down in Okara, reported ARY News.

Yaqoob was arrested after a video of him thrashing his neighbour’s kids with slippers after tying them upside down went viral on social media. The children’s mother had left them at Yaqoob’s residence before going to her parents’ house after a fight with her husband.

ماں سے ملنے جانے پر چچا کا بھتیجوں پر بد ترین تشدد ماں سے ملنے جانے پر چچا کا بھتیجوں پر بد ترین تشدد — چھوٹے سے معصوم بچے کو کپڑے سے باندھ کر لٹکا دیا — بچے روتے رہے، فریاد کرتے رہے، ظالم کو ترس نہ آیا — اوکاڑہ میں درندہ صفت بھتیجوں پر بیہمانہ تشدد#ARYNews Posted by ARY News on Saturday, October 19, 2019

He reportedly beat up the children for insisting on meeting their mother.

Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar took notice of the torture on the minor boys and ordered action against the man.

Acting on his directives, the Okara deputy commissioner met the parents of the children and got a first-hand account of the matter.

The DC said the children will undergo a medical check-up and pledged financial support for their treatment and education. He said the government will enrol them in a school, bear expenses of their ailing mother’s treatment and offer a government job to their father.
